document_data.name: Toss Your Tankard
document_data.mainbody: '''Toss Your Tankard''' was an alehouse in [[New Velar|Harrowdale]] named for a brawl where newly purchased pewter tankards were used as missile weapons in a dispute between two rival mercenary groups. This sort of behavior was discourage from that point forward, as depicted on the signboard where the barkeep charged a rowdy patron's backside with a [[pike (weapon)|pike]] to make his "point."
document_data.Location: The tavern was located at the intersection of [[Melurk Street]] and [[Moonside Lane]] near the center of town.
document_data.Atmosphere: Toss Your Tankard was clean and well-lit. Common fare included buns filled with sliced cheeses and meats, brandy, and cordials. The tables were situated far enough apart to allow patrons to lounge and also provided a degree of discretion for business dealings.
document_data.Inhabitants: Merchants could be found in the alehouse at all hours of the day discussing trade arrangements.
